name: Allen Iverson
description: 6'0" guard, 'The Answer'. Smallest MVP ever, cultural icon. Heart of a giant, played through pain, changed the game and the culture.

crossover.name: The Crossover
crossover.prompt: executing signature crossover - ball whipping side to side, defender stumbling, cornrows flying, the move that changed basketball, small man dominating giants

step-over.name: The Step Over
step-over.prompt: stepping over fallen defender after hitting shot - looking down with cold stare, the iconic moment of small man dominance, defiance personified

practice-rant.name: Practice?
practice-rant.prompt: animated at press conference podium - hands gesturing, incredulous expression, 'we talking about practice?', the realest interview ever

heart-over-height.name: Heart Over Height
heart-over-height.prompt: driving lane between towering defenders - tiny frame surrounded by giants, fearless attack at basket, heart bigger than any center

arm-sleeve-swag.name: The Trendsetter
arm-sleeve-swag.prompt: standing in full gear with arm sleeve and headband - cornrows braided tight, tattoos visible, the look that changed NBA fashion, street style meets league

playing-hurt.name: Playing Hurt
playing-hurt.prompt: limping but still attacking - wrapped ankle, pain visible, refusing to quit, the warrior who played through everything, heart on display
